data.enText: a duty, responsibility, etc. that causes worry, difficulty or hard work

data.chText: 承受 / 担负 / 减轻 / 减少 / 分担重担
国家担负起了照料老人的大部分责任。
data.enText: The main burden of caring for old people falls on the state.

data.chText: 加在劳动者头上的重税
data.enText: the heavy tax burden on working people

data.chText: 我不想在年老的时候成为孩子们的累赘。
data.enText: I don't want to become a burden to my children when I'm old.
a heavy load that is difficult to carry

data.chText: （使）担负（沉重或艰难的任务、职责等）
data.enText: to give sb a duty, responsibility, etc. that causes worry, difficulty or hard work

data.chText: 他们负担了一笔很高的按揭借款。
data.enText: They have burdened themselves with a high mortgage.

data.chText: 我不想让你为我的烦恼操心。
data.enText: I don't want to burden you with my worries.
to be burdened by high taxation

data.chText: 她提着两只沉重的手提箱下了公共汽车。
data.enText: She got off the bus, burdened with two heavy suitcases.

means: (使)担负(沉重或艰难的任务、职责等)

tr: weight to be borne or conveyed

example: that's a load off my mind

tr: the central idea that is expanded in a document or discourse
the central meaning or theme of a speech or literary work
impose a task upon, assign a responsibility to
example: He charged her with cleaning up all the files over the weekend

value.def: If you describe a problem or a responsibility as a burden, you mean that it causes someone a lot of difficulty, worry, or hard work.

example.ex: The developing  countries bear the burden of an enormous external debt...
example.tran: 发展中国家背负着巨额外债。

example.ex: They don't go around with the burdens of the world on their shoulders the whole time...
example.tran: 他们不会一直背负整个世界的重担。

example.ex: Her death will be an impossible burden on Paul...
example.tran: 她的去世将给保罗带来难以承受的打击。

example.ex: The financial burden will be more evenly shared.
example.tran: 财政负担将被更加平均地分担。

gramarinfo.label: usu with supp, oft N <l>of/on</l> n

value.def: A burden is a heavy load that is difficult to carry.
If someone burdens you with something that is likely to worry you, for example a problem or a difficult decision, they tell you about it.

example.ex: We decided not to burden him with the news.
example.tran: 我们决定不拿这个消息去烦他。

value.def: The burden of proof is the task of proving that you are correct, for example when you have accused someone of a crime.

example.ex: The burden of proof is on the prosecution.
